means: 宽大，仁慈( leniency的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: All practices of corruption and corrupt elements shall be found out through investigation without tolerance or lenience.
sentence.Network_cn: 对任何腐败行为和腐败分子,都必须一查到底,决不姑息,决不手软.

sentence.Network_en: We can feel intensely the writer motherly affection, sympathy, lenience and kindness by reading her works.
sentence.Network_cn: 阅读她的作品,我们可以强烈地感受到作家如地母般的慈爱和悲悯 、 宽厚和善良.

means.word_mean: 1. mercifulness as a consequence of being lenient or tolerant
2. a disposition to yield to the wishes of someone;
3. lightening a penalty or excusing from a chore by judges or parents or teachers

sentences.en: All practices of corruption and corrupt elements shall be found out through investigation without tolerance or lenience.
sentences.cn: 对任何腐败行为和腐败分子，都必须一查到底，决不姑息，决不手软。
